DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Past Year Greater Than 72 Hour Correctional Institute Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of whether the donor has a history of spending > 72 hours in a correction/detention center in the last 12 months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Donor Past Year Greater Than 72 Hour Correctional Institute Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._Before the present time._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::72_A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._A penal institution maintained by the government._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredName: Past Year Greater Than Integer::72 Hour Correctional Institute Present
Property.preferredDefinition: Before the present time.:A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::72:A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:A penal institution maintained by the government.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
A penal institution maintained by the government.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.
